@graph.reasoning: The United States Postal Service is not subject to antitrust liability.

@graph.cite: Postal Service v. Council of Greenburgh Civic Assns., 453 U. S. 114 (1981)
@graph.reasoning: Account of the origins and mission of the postal system.

@graph.cite: Postal Reorganization Act of 1970, 39 U. S. C. ยง 101 et seq.
@graph.caseNumber: 39 U. S. C. ยง 101 et seq.
@graph.reasoning: Created to increase the efficiency of the Postal Service and reduce political influences on its operations.

@graph.cite: Sherman Act, ch. 647, 26 Stat. 209, as amended, 15 U. S. C. ยง 1 et seq.
@graph.caseNumber: 15 U. S. C. ยง 1 et seq.
@graph.reasoning: The Postal Reorganization Act of 1970 does not exempt the Postal Service from liability under the Sherman Act.
